titles.title: Referring the bill (H.R. 798), entitled "For the relief of Adrian Rodriguez", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
2/3/2009--Introduced.
Refers a specified private relief bill to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims with instructions for a report back to the House of Representatives.
